X.v.1.D.1.i
.
Hearing by an Employee Who Did Not Participate in the Prior Decision
The phrase
did not participate in the proposed action
means the hearing official did not
issue the decision under single signature, or
second sign the decision.
Explanation
:Â  This is to assure the claimant/beneficiary or appellant that the hearing official will not have pre-judged the issue.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D  - Regional Office (RO) Hearings
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D
